author: Shyama Rajagopal
title: Good to be back home, says COVID-19 survivor
description: Latheesh C.L. has just one thing to say: “Stay home, stay safe”, for he is a COVID-19 survivor. It is good to be at home, he says. He has to observe a 28-day quarantine before moving out. “We [online
content:
Latheesh C.L. has just one thing to say: Stay home, stay safe, for he is a COVID-19 survivor. It is good to be at home, he says. He has to observe a 28-day quarantine before moving out. 
We [online cab drivers] were aware of the danger but never expected to … [+1582 chars]
